# The  Game, version 1.0.0.

## By me

Learn topology with Lean!

# What is this game?

In this game, you will learn topology and Lean at the same time. Travel through different worlds solving challenges. On the left side 
of the screen you will find tactics and theorems you can use.

Have fun!

# Credits
